title: For what values of c is || c (1,2,3) || = 1? - Quora

response.answer_text: if you mean by ||.|| a norm of vector and since if you have not mentioned the type I assume second norm. and if (1,2,3) is 3d vector in Cartesian coordinate hence: sqrt( c^2 (1^2+2^2+3^2) )=1 |c|.sqrt(14)=1 ==> c = +-1/sqrt(14)
